data.meta_description: Please request pins at least ONE MONTH before your scheduled ceremony date. Important Notes This form is available to administrators of White Coat Ceremonies and Pledge/Oath Ceremonies at accredited institutions. ... chevron_right Read more
data.text:
This form is available to administrators of White Coat Ceremonies and Pledge/Oath Ceremonies at accredited institutions. If your school is undergoing the accreditation process and has not yet received full accreditation, or you are a student requesting a replacement pin, or have any questions about the program, please contact Michelle Sloane at msloane@gold-foundation.org.

By requesting Keeping Healthcare Human pins from The Arnold P. Gold Foundation you agree to recognize the Foundation’s gift in published materials with the statement: “Keeping Healthcare Human pins are a gift from The Arnold P. Gold Foundation, initiators of the first White Coat Ceremony in 1993.”

For ideas, planning tips, and downloadable templates, visit our Medical Ceremony Toolkit and Nursing Ceremony Toolkit.
